name: Forest of Dizziness
description:
Welcome to the Forest of Dizziness!

You're a brave explorer looking for one of the lost Faberge egg, which is told to be in the depths of the forest. Watch out your health, because as you go inside this maze you will lose stamina. 

Thankfully, there are friendly pixies who will help you in your quest, altough they are also a bit naughty, so they will also make you dizzy and the controls will change.

Good luck!
